bot.application_id: {% if bot.application_id %}{{ bot.application_id | xml_escape | replace: site.data.strings.newline, '\n' }}{% else %}{{ bot.client_id | xml_escape | replace: site.data.strings.newline, '\n' }}{% endif %}
bot.name: {{ bot.botname | xml_escape | replace: site.data.strings.newline, '\n' }}
bot.description: {{ bot.description | strip_html | xml_escape | truncate:60 | replace: site.data.strings.newline, '\n' }}
bot.long_description: {% if bot.long_description %}{{ bot.long_description | xml_escape | replace: site.data.strings.newline, '\n' }}{% else %}{% endif %}
bot.url_safe: {{ bot.botname | xml_escape | downcase | replace:' ', '' | replace: site.data.strings.newline, '\n' }}
bot.verified: {% if bot.verified %}{{ bot.verified | replace: site.data.strings.newline, '\n' }}{% else %}false{% endif %}
